en.name: Skyward Spine
en.passiveDescription: Increases CRIT Rate by {{8//10//12//14//16%}} and increases Normal ATK SPD by {{12//12//12//12//12%}}. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a {{50//50//50//50//50%}} chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals {{40//55//70//85//100%}} of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.
